Package game.roles

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.roles.enemies.Enemy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, Resettable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Goomba, Koopa
public abstract class Enemy
extends Actor
implements Resettable
Basic Enemy class with default behaviours.

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy​(java.lang.String name, char displayChar, int hitPoints, int attackDamage, java.lang.String verb)
      Constructor the general Enemy constructor with set default behaviours
      Parameters:
      name - for this current Enemy name
      attackDamage - the damage this enemy carries
      displayChar - the display of character on map this enemy carry
      hitPoints - the hit point of this enemy
      verb - the verb that will display for the enemy when the attack occur

      public ActionList allowableActions​(Actor otherActor, java.lang.String direction, GameMap map)
      Returns a new collection of the Actions that the otherActor can do to the current Actor.
      Overrides:

      map - current GameMap

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      This playTurn is default for Enemies and can be overridden
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      the parent class: Enemy playTurn
